short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI Lead-Gen Assistant: Monitor Facebook groups, Twitter, LinkedIn, Reddit to find leads

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
What can Devi do for my business?
1. Devi AI Monitor private and public Facebook group posts to find leads. 

2. Devi also monitors Reddit, Twitter and LinkedIn Global posts. 

3. Outreach the leads with ChatGPT generated sales and non-salesy replies and fully automated follow ups to save you time and close more deals. 

4. Create & Schedule: 1-click to create engaging posts using  top 50+ AI prompts and schedule them on all your social media with ease. Save you or your team 2-3 precious hours a day.  

Devi is a productivity tool and fully compliant with social media platform policies. We do not store any data accessed or processed through the Tool. Any data stored in the user's browser while using the Tool is temporary and automatically deleted. Our Tool does not permanently collect or store any user information or social media data.
